backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, products, bundles, orders, download tokens, invite statuses, and Stripe configuration with storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON structure.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page loading the React frontend entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes for store, account, payments, and admin pages wrapped in StoreLayout and ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/account/Principa: Component displaying user's principal ID with copy-to-clipboard functionality and status messages.
frontend/src/components/admin/FileUpload: Admin file upload component converting files to ExternalBlob with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard blocking access to admin pages unless authenticated and admin, showing alerts otherwise.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal prompting new authenticated users to submit name and optional TradingView username, saving the profile via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps content and displays a login prompt if the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/layout/StoreLayo: Provides the main store layout with navigation, category links, admin controls, mobile menu, and includes the profile‑setup modal.
frontend/src/components/store/CategoryNa: Renders category buttons linking to category pages based on fetched categories.
frontend/src/components/store/DownloadBu: Handles downloading a product file as a .pine script with status and error toasts.
frontend/src/components/store/InviteOnly: Collects and submits a TradingView username for invite‑only products with simple validation.
frontend/src/components/store/ProductCar: Displays a product summary card with title, price, category, and invite‑required badge.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks for fetching and updating user profile, role, and admin status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, loading and managing identities and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrincipalId.ts: Derives authenticated state and principal ID from the Internet Identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on products, bundles, categories, and invite statuses using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeCheckout.ts: Defines a mutation hook to create Stripe checkout sessions via the backend and return the session URL.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for theming in light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React root, sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and mounts the App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBundlesPag: Renders bundle management UI with create, edit, and delete actions using related query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Displays product categories retrieved from the backend with simple loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardL: Provides the admin dashboard layout with navigation and protected routing for admin pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteRequ: Shows invite request records and allows admins to update invite status via a dropdown.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Placeholder page informing that order tracking will be available once backend support is implemented.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Implements product management UI with support for creating, editing, and deleting products, including file uploads.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminStripeSett: UI for admins to configure Stripe secret key and allowed countries, with form handling and save notifications.
Admin interface to assign user roles by principal ID with validation and role selection.
Static page displaying a financial and liability disclaimer for the platform.
frontend/src/pages/legal/PrivacyPolicyPa: Static privacy policy outlining data collection, usage, sharing, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/legal/RefundPolicyPag: Static refund policy describing conditions and process for refund requests on digital products.
frontend/src/pages/legal/TermsPage.tsx: Static terms of service describing usage rules, obligations, and legal limitations.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFailu: Displays a message for cancelled or failed payments with options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentSucce: Shows payment confirmation and links to purchases or continued shopping.
frontend/src/pages/store/AccountPage.tsx: Authenticated account settings page showing the user's Internet Identity principal ID.
frontend/src/pages/store/BundleDetailPag: Displays detailed info for a bundle, including included products and a Stripe checkout flow.
frontend/src/pages/store/BundlesListingP: Lists all bundles with names, descriptions, prices, and navigation to each bundle's detail page.
frontend/src/pages/store/CategoryListing: Shows products within a selected category using ProductCard components.
frontend/src/pages/store/HomePage.tsx: Provides the storefront homepage with hero section, categories, featured products, and bundle previews.
frontend/src/pages/store/ProductDetailPa: Displays product details, instructions, and allows initiating a Stripe checkout for purchase.
frontend/src/pages/store/PurchasesPage.t: Shows the user's purchased products and invite statuses within an authenticated page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the ecommerce site's purpose, architecture notes, and a list of implemented features with IDs, versions, and requirements.
